main event: A bright red object with a luminous tail was observed traveling very high and very fast over Palm Beach, Florida on June 27, 1960.
interesting points: The object was tracked moving from northwest to southeast,The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes,There were indications that the object could have been a missile due to military activities on that date,The sighting was communicated from a pilot boat to the Coast Guard,The object was estimated to be at an altitude of approximately 15,000 feet.
sighted object: a bright red object with a luminous tail
witness description: Coast Guard report from a pilot boat
